column1: Daily Weather Observations for Gold Coast, Queensland for April 2025
Prepared at 13:01 UTC on Monday 18 August 2025   IDCJDW4050.202504
Observations from the Gold Coast Seaway, at the northern end of Southport Spit.

The Gold Coast Seaway site is an Automatic Weather Station (AWS) at the northern end of Southport Spit. If you are interested in the southern end of the Gold Coast, see the observations from Coolangatta.
Observations were drawn from Gold Coast Seaway {station 040764}
